remarks: Strong extensionality for multiplication.  Given excluded middle, apartness would be equivalent to negated equality and this would follow readily (for all operations) from ~ oveq12 .  For us, it is proved a different way.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Feb-2020.)
statement: mulext $p |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) /\ ( C e. CC /\ D e. CC ) ) -> ( ( A x. B ) # ( C x. D ) -> ( A # C \/ B # D ) ) ) $.
